alert.note: Alert for Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 4:13AM CDT until July 14 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Scott County in western Arkansas... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 412 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Echo to near Hartford, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Waldron... Beauchamp... Oliver... Morgan Springs... Bates... Black Fork... Y City... Cauthron... Needmore... Winfield... Boles... Parks... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
